hidden_dimensions.name: Frizz Control
hidden_dimensions.description: Ability to reduce or eliminate frizz, especially in humid conditions or for specific hair types (wavy, curly, graying).

hidden_dimensions.name: Hair Manageability
hidden_dimensions.description: How easily the shampoo makes hair to style, detangle, and maintain throughout the day. Addresses issues like tangles and overall ease of handling.

hidden_dimensions.name: Hair Texture & Appearance
hidden_dimensions.description: Impact on hair's texture (softness, dryness) and appearance (shine, body). Users seek improvements in these areas.

hidden_dimensions.name: Scent
hidden_dimensions.description: The pleasantness and strength of the shampoo's scent, and how it lingers after washing.

hidden_dimensions.name: Value for Money
hidden_dimensions.description: Whether the shampoo's performance justifies its price, especially when compared to salon or other more expensive brands.

hidden_dimensions.name: Hair Loss & Thinning
hidden_dimensions.description: The ability of the shampoo to address hair loss or thinning concerns, especially for users experiencing hormonal changes or aging.

hidden_dimensions.name: Ingredient Quality & Safety
hidden_dimensions.description: Users seek shampoos with safe, natural, and non-toxic ingredients, and the absence of harsh chemicals.

hidden_dimensions.name: Hair Type Specificity
hidden_dimensions.description: How well the shampoo caters to specific hair types such as curly, straight, fine, thick, African, or gray hair.
